original_title: Buklog: The Ritual System of the Subanen of Zamboanga Peninsula
overview: The documentary shows how a grand Subanen ritual 'Buklog' was held and the preparations that went with it in Kumalarang, Zamboanga del Sur, with interviews from Subanen community leaders and balyans or shamans.
title: Buklog: The Ritual System of the Subanen of Zamboanga Peninsula
